description:
Remote Connections & Passwords. Everywhere!


DVLS 2025.2 is required with this version (only if you're already using DVLS)

### Improvements

- Added a folder creation mode for VMware Synchromizer
- Added support for linked proxy tunnel VPNs in terminal entries
- Allowed Jump host session to start as undocked

### Fixes

- Fixed an issue preventing the disconnect on idle to work in the user vault
- Fixed bitwarden synchronizers not properly cleaning Bitwarden Secret key for
  TOTP entries
- Fixed double click on SQL console treeview crashing
- Fixed empty root issue when MFA auth is cancelled
- Fixed issue allowing replies to disabled users in secure messaging
- Fixed issue when connecting to websites through network scan
- Fixed issue where going Online in User Vault doesn't change the icon in the
  Status bar
- Fixed issue where script were executed on gateway instead of selected
  connection
- Fixed issue with macros/scripts/tools not resolving host and credentials
  properly
- Fixed issue with offline mode in Hub
- Fixed loading issue with pre shared key for Wireguard peers
- Fixed Opened Session state of jump session being lost after automatic refresh
- Fixed potential error when changing nodes in the AWS Dashboard
- Fixed potential error when reconnecting to undocked sessions
- Fixed potential error when the Windows daily theme change triggers
- Fixed potential freeze when stopping SSH Key Agent
- Fixed read-only flag persisting on files for embedded document
- Fixed session tools not loading in a few connection views
